catentdesc.name: Hermitage Fit and Flare Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Jewel-toned cocktail dress with fitted bodice and gently flared skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Classically tailored, this elegant satin dress features a bateau neckline, soft pleating, and a clasped belt to define the waist.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Empire Waist Sundress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Empire waist sundress with flower print and frilly sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: This oh so sheer dress will fit you like a dream, and you won't want to get out of this incredibly soft fabric. The fabulous flower print lights up the room you are in and will get you attention like never before.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Empire Waist Slip Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Empire waist slip dress with a V-neck and long flared sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: You can just about picture yourself in this V-necked dress doing a tango or salsa. The long sleeves and flare will add grace to your every move, dancing or otherwise. Rest assured, you will be a picture in motion.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Pencil Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Pencil dress with fabric detailing and three-quarter sleeve
catentdesc.longdescription: You will be the picture of professionalism in this pencil dress. Its incredible fit will add poise and glamor to your everyday world.

catentdesc.name: Albini Straight Cocktail Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Straight cocktail dress with round neck and sequence work
catentdesc.longdescription: Round-necked sequined dress that adds character to your late-night parties. It can also double as a top paired with leggings and make you the perfect hostess.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Strapless Cocktail Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Strapless cocktail dress with appliqued roses and tassels at the hem
catentdesc.longdescription: Strapless red cocktail dress with empire waist enhances your figure. The appliqued roses and tassels at the hem gives character to the dress while the red silk bow adds to the style

catentdesc.name: Albini Sleeveless Slip Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: V-necked casual slip dress with spaghetti straps and flowery print
catentdesc.longdescription: V-necked dress that can be worn in any season and suitable for every occasion. Look like a dream in this flowery print with the wind ruffling the uneven hem and your hair.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Sleeveless Slip Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Halter V-necked dress with layered skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Halter dress with V-neck and layered skirt that is ready for a night on the town. The casual layers are chic and add spring to your step.

catentdesc.name: Albini A-line Cotton Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Double-color casual short sleeve dress with soft collar
catentdesc.longdescription: There's nothing like this short sleeve dress with soft collar. Stylish and modern with a playful edge, it's perfect for both work and play.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Casual Strapless Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Strapless slip dress with layered skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Shoulder-less black dress with a layered skirt spiced up with a brown belt to emphasize your figure. Perfect for a night out with your friends or a picnic.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Strapless Sundress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Strapless sundress with smoked bodice and flowery print
catentdesc.longdescription: Celebrate life with this sheer strapless sundress that makes your mornings brighter. Perfect for a picnic or for a lazy day in the park.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Short Sleeved Wrap Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Short sleeved wrap dress with flared skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Wrap-around dress with a flared skirt that ends just below the knee adds grace to your walk. The perfect outfit for the workplace or for an outing.

catentdesc.name: Albini Silk Evening Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Silk cocktail dress with pleated neck and hem
catentdesc.longdescription: Luxurious silk dress with pleated neck and hem. Perfect for the red carpet or for a spectacular entrance.

catentdesc.name: Albini Casual Knit Strapless Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Strapless knit A-line summer dress with polka dots
catentdesc.longdescription: Strapless knit summer dress perfect for picnics and life in the city. The polka dots and brown belt add style to simplicity.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Pleated Sleeveless Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless slip dress with satin hem and flared body
catentdesc.longdescription: Perfect for summer, this sleeveless dress with satin hem and flared body keeps you cool.

catentdesc.name: Albini Empire Waist Knit Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: V-necked sleeveless dress with empire waist and belt tie
catentdesc.longdescription: The V neck and the straight cuts of this pleasant dress add spring to your step. The empire waist enhances your figure and the belt tie adds charm. Beaches, parks, shops - wear this any place and give people a reason to smile.

catentdesc.name: Albini Sleeveless Silk Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Silk sheath cocktail dress with straight lines and high neck
catentdesc.longdescription: This silk dress gives you confidence and the fabric molds your body with a fluidity that takes your breath away.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Silk Evening Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless evening dress with applique and sequined work
catentdesc.longdescription: A different take on the little black dress. This black dress adds applique and sequined work in different colors to give it a different dimension. The pleated skirt and the waist band give it a sophisticated touch while retaining a timeless look.

catentdesc.name: Albini Strapless Pencil Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Strapless casual denim dress with seam detailing
catentdesc.longdescription: Strapless dress that brings out the feminine feel of denim. A perfect fit for your casual wardrobe.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Strapless Sundress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Strapless sundress with smoked top and gored skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Strapless sundress with flowery print designed to make you feel the joy of being alive. The smoked top and gored skirt along with the sash at the back add charm to a classic design.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Pencil Cocktail Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Strapless pencil evening dress
catentdesc.longdescription: A must for every wardrobe, this strapless dress is a classic. With a layered look on top, it tapers down to capture the essence of your figure.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Empire Waist Evening Gown
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless evening gown with ruched front and sequence work
catentdesc.longdescription: This sleeveless evening gown will add beauty and charm to your everyday life, and make every occasion special. The ruched front and the sequined strip just below gives the dress a sophisticated air.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Sleeveless Sequined Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless cocktail dress with high neck and sequence work
catentdesc.longdescription: Sleeveless sequined dress that shimmers with intensity. There's nothing understated about this dress and will ensure that you never go unnoticed.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Turtleneck Sweater Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Turtleneck sweater dress with short sleeves and straight cut
catentdesc.longdescription: Turtleneck sweater dress with straight cut and elegant design keeps you warm on a cold day. Team it up with leggings to keep your legs warm and to give it a new look.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Casual Sweater Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless sweater dress with cowl neck
catentdesc.longdescription: Sleeveless sweater dress with cowl neck to keep you snug indoors or outdoors. A worthwhile addition to your wardrobe that is the perfect choice for a chilly evening.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Sleeveless Sundress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless sundress with fitted top and gored skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Sleeveless sundress with twisted straps and pleated fitted top. The gored skirt adds grace to your walk and gives you a fresh look.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Cocktail Sheath Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Figure-hugging sleeveless cocktail dress with empire waist
catentdesc.longdescription: A picture of sophistication, this sleeveless black dress with ruched top and empire waist. This dress is a must have for any wardrobe.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Fitted Cocktail Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Strapless cocktail dress with ruched bodice
catentdesc.longdescription: Strapless and fitted, this dress enhances your silhouette. The ruched look gives a sophisticated look.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Casual Maxi Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Casual maxi dress with satin V-neck
catentdesc.longdescription: This printed sundress with satin straps that also form the V-neck is suitable for any outing. The flared skirt adds to the elegance.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Smoked Caftan Sundress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Colorful printed sundress with loosely fitted top and smoked skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Colorful printed sundress with loosely fitted top cools a hot day. The smoked skirt is a refreshing design makes you feel calm and composed.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Mid Length Cocktail Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless cocktail dress with lace work and satin strip at the waist
catentdesc.longdescription: Shapely cocktail dress covered with black lace adds detail to an otherwise simple design. The satin strip at the waist and the tiny bow gives a sophisticated look.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Casual Evening Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless slip dress with ruffled front and lace work
catentdesc.longdescription: A simple and elegant dress with a ruffled top and lace straps, along with an empire waist. The layered, gored skirt completes the look, and you'll feel as light as a cloud wearing this chic dress.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Plaid Party Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless plaid casual dress with empire waist
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple plaid dress with empire waist cinched with a black belt. The front pockets add a modern practical look and feel.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Layered Sundress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless sundress with layered skirt and black net waist tie
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple sundress designed to give a calm and soothing effect. The black net waist tie and layered bottom add a touch of detail to this soft design.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Casual Wool Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless plaid dress with gored skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple plaid dress with fitted top and gored skirt brings out your fun side. The fabric detailing and the cinched waist provide a chic look.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Knit Cocktail Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: One shoulder evening dress with layered top and gored skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: This dress is the prime example of elegance redefined with one shoulder top, teamed with a gored skirt that gives it oomph like no other. The layered top and the strategic pleats give the aura of a diva and the confidence to get you everywhere.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Knit Casual Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Printed sleeveless pencil dress
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple, yet elegant, the print on this dress reminds you of the ocean. The figure hugging design provides a sophisticated look to this slip dress.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Striped Pencil Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: One shoulder pencil evening dress with stripes
catentdesc.longdescription: Shapely one shoulder striped dress designed to give the impression of different types of crossover, be it on the road, in your personal life, or in your profession.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Gored Evening Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sleeveless evening dress with sequence work and gored skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: This 2-piece dress with a shimmering top and elegant gored skirt is the perfect accessory for any evening. This design sets off your figure and gives the impression of softness and boldness, all at once.
